caption.p: Structural and morphological characterizations: a) Rietveld refined XRD pattern with corresponding cell parameters of the as‐prepared Na 0.76Cu 0.22Fe 0.30Mn 0.48O 2. b) Schematic illustration of the P2‐type crystal structure. SEM images of the c) electrospun nanofibers and d) resultant Na 0.76Cu 0.22Fe 0.30Mn 0.48O 2 nano‐necklaces. e) TEM image, f) HRTEM image with an inset of FFT image, g) SAED pattern, h,i) HRTEM images, and j) SEM‐EDS mapping images of the Na 0.76Cu 0.22Fe 0.30Mn 0.48O 2 nano‐necklaces.
